channel.title: Help with portFowarding
channel.description: hey,i need to make my server able for other to play. ive done portforward.com,utorrent..doesnt work (most likely i F***ed up) so if you can send me a message on here.with helpfull infromation id be happy if we went on teamviewer. ill send you client if you request it so u can see whats going on. iam able to play PERFECTLY on my computer but at my friends house it says loading char profile,please wait and it just says that everytime you try to login,and same thing with my other computers in my house.

item.title: Help with portFowarding
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

helpme1887:

hey,i need to make my server able for other to play. ive done portforward.com,utorrent…doesnt work (most likely i F***ed up) so if you can send me a message on here.with helpfull infromation id be happy if we went on teamviewer. ill send you client if you request it so u can see whats going on. iam able to play PERFECTLY on my computer but at my friends house it says loading char profile,please wait and it just says that everytime you try to login,and same thing with my other computers in my house.

hey dude i know all you problems ive been searshing for weeks and weeks to get it right i have ports open etc… en utorrent doesnt work :S

but yesterday i found a new thing and it worked for me the only thing ever worked for me in hosting he told it verry noob friendly so it is sooo easy

he dit it with bit torrent searsh in server help for portforwarding and then seash for that bit torrent thing ( not utorrent) that tut is so gay
